title: Edges of graphs expressed as sets of unordered pairs

blocks.name: upgredgssspr
blocks.content: The set of edges of a pseudograph is a subset of the set of unordered pairs of vertices. (Contributed by AV, 24-Nov-2021.)

blocks.name: uspgropssxp
blocks.content: The set ` G ` of "simple pseudographs" for a fixed set ` V ` of vertices is a subset of a Cartesian product. For more details about the class ` G ` of all "simple pseudographs" see comments on ~ uspgrbisymrel . (Contributed by AV, 24-Nov-2021.)

thm uspgropssxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cxp(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cpw(cfv(cspr, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, copab(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl5eqss(c2, cxp(c1, c3), copab(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  opabssxpd(s0, s1, c1, c3, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))))))
  biimpac(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  eqcoms(cv(s0), c0, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  eleq1(c0, cv(s0), c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  impcom(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  rexlimiv(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  3exp(wcel(cv(s2), cuspgr), wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  3eltr4d(cv(s1), c3, cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cpw(cfv(cspr, c0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cuspgr), wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cuspgr), wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cpw(cfv(cspr, c0))), wss(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cfv(cspr, c0)))
  sseqtrd(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cfv(cspr, c0), cfv(cspr, cfv(cvtx, cv(s2))), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cuspgr), wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(cv(s2), cuspgr), wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wss(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cfv(cspr, cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s2), cuspgr), wss(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cfv(cspr, cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)))), wcel(cv(s2), cupgr))
  uspgrupgr(cv(s2))
  upgredgssspr(cv(s2))
  fveq2d(cspr, cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cuspgr), wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), c0)))

  simp2l(wcel(cv(s2), cuspgr), wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  simp3(wcel(cv(s2), cuspgr), wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  elpw(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cfv(cspr, c0))

  eqcomd(cv(s1), cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))))
  simpr(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(cv(s2), cuspgr), wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c3, cpw(cfv(cspr, c0))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s2, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

thm uspgropssxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 ‚äÜ(c1 √ó c3))
  ‚ä£ c3 = P((Pairs ` c0))
  ‚ä£ c2 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl5eqss(c2, (c1 √ó c3), { < s0, s1 > |(s0 = c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))}, c0 ‚àà c1)
  opabssxpd(s0, s1, c1, c3, c0 ‚àà c1, (s0 = c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1))))
  biimpac(c0 ‚àà c1, (s0 = c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1))), s0 ‚àà c1)
  adantr(s0 = c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî s0 ‚àà c1))
  eqcoms(s0, c0, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî s0 ‚àà c1))
  eleq1(c0, s0, c1)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, (s0 = c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1))), s1 ‚àà c3)
  impcom(s0 = c0, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)), s1 ‚àà c3)
  rexlimiv(s2, cuspgr, ((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1), (s0 = c0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà c3))
  3exp(s2 ‚àà USPGraph, ((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1), s0 = c0, s1 ‚àà c3)
  3eltr4d(s1, c3, (Edg ` s2), P((Pairs ` c0)), (s2 ‚àà USPGraph ‚àß((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)‚àß s0 = c0))
  sylibr((s2 ‚àà USPGraph ‚àß((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)‚àß s0 = c0), (Edg ` s2)‚àà P((Pairs ` c0)), (Edg ` s2)‚äÜ(Pairs ` c0))
  sseqtrd((Edg ` s2), (Pairs ` c0), (Pairs `(Vtx ` s2)), (s2 ‚àà USPGraph ‚àß((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)‚àß s0 = c0))
  3ad2ant1(s2 ‚àà USPGraph, ((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1), s0 = c0, (Edg ` s2)‚äÜ(Pairs `(Vtx ` s2)))
  syl(s2 ‚àà USPGraph, (Edg ` s2)‚äÜ(Pairs `(Vtx ` s2)), s2 ‚àà UPGraph)
  uspgrupgr(s2)
  upgredgssspr(s2)
  fveq2d(cspr, (Vtx ` s2), c0, (s2 ‚àà USPGraph ‚àß((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)‚àß s0 = c0))
  eqtrd((Vtx ` s2), c0, s0, (s2 ‚àà USPGraph ‚àß((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)‚àß s0 = c0))
  simp2l(s2 ‚àà USPGraph, (Vtx ` s2)= s0, (Edg ` s2)= s1, s0 = c0)
  simp3(s2 ‚àà USPGraph, ((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1), s0 = c0)
  elpw((Edg ` s2), (Pairs ` c0))
  fvex(cedg, s2)
  3ad2ant2(s2 ‚àà USPGraph, ((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1), s0 = c0, s1 =(Edg ` s2))
  eqcomd(s1, (Edg ` s2), ((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1))
  simpr((Vtx ` s2)= s0, (Edg ` s2)= s1)
  a1i((s2 ‚àà USPGraph ‚àß((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)‚àß s0 = c0), c3 = P((Pairs ` c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s2, s0 = c0, s1 ‚àà c3)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, c3)

blocks.name: uspgrsprfv
blocks.content: The value of the function ` F ` which maps a "simple pseudograph" for a fixed set ` V ` of vertices to the set of edges (i.e. range of the edge function) of the graph. Solely for ` G ` as defined here, the function ` F ` is a bijection between the "simple pseudographs" and the subsets of the set of pairs ` P ` over the fixed set ` V ` of vertices, see ~ uspgrbispr . (Contributed by AV, 24-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm uspgrsprfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cpw(cfv(cspr, c4)))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s3, c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wceq(c3, cpw(cfv(cspr, c4))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1))))))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), diffsc(s2, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), diffsc(s2, c4))
  fvmptd(s3, c2, c0, cfv(c2nd, c0), c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s3)), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s3, c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s3)))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s3), c0), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(s3)), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  fveq2(cv(s3), c0, c2nd)
  id(wcel(c0, c1))
  fvexd(c2nd, c0, wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s3, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s3)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, c0, c1)
}

thm uspgrsprfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0))
  ‚ä£ c3 = P((Pairs ` c4))
  ‚ä£ c1 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 = c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))}
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s3 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(2nd ` s3))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), c3 = P((Pairs ` c4)))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), c1 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 = c4 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))})
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), d(s0, s1))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), d(s0, s2))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), d(s1, s2))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), d(s1, c3))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), d(s1, c4))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), d(s2, c3))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ` c0)=(2nd ` c0)), d(s2, c4))
  fvmptd(s3, c2, c0, (2nd ` c0), c1, (2nd ` s3), universe, c0 ‚àà c1)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 =(s3 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(2nd ` s3)))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, s3 = c0, (2nd ` s3)=(2nd ` c0))
  fveq2(s3, c0, c2nd)
  id(c0 ‚àà c1)
  fvexd(c2nd, c0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s3, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s3)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: uspgrsprf
blocks.content: The mapping ` F ` is a function from the "simple pseudographs" with a fixed set of vertices ` V ` into the subsets of the set of pairs over the set ` V ` . (Contributed by AV, 24-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm uspgrsprf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wf(c0, c1, c2)
  -| wceq(c2, cpw(cfv(cspr, c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s3, c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wf(c0, c1, c2), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wf(c0, c1, c2), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wf(c0, c1, c2), diffsc(s1, c3))
  a1ii(wf(c0, c1, c2), diffsc(s2, c2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, c1, c2), diffsc(s2, c3))
  fmpti(s3, c0, c1, c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s3)))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s3), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(s3)), c2), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s3), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))))))))

thm uspgrsprf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 = P((Pairs ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c1 = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))}
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s3 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(2nd ` s3))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), d(s0, s1))
  a1ii((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), d(s1, c3))
  a1ii((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), d(s2, c2))
  a1ii((c0 : c1 ‚Üí c2), d(s2, c3))
  fmpti(s3, c0, c1, c2, (2nd ` s3))
  sylbi(s3 ‚àà c1, (2nd ` s3)‚àà c2, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s3 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))))))
  bitri(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÉ(s1,(s3 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))))), s3 ‚àà { < s0, s1 > |(s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))})
  eleq2i(s3, c1, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))})
  elopab(s0, s1, s3, (s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1))))
  exlimivv(s0, s1, (s3 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))), (2nd ` s3)‚àà c2)
  sylibr((s3 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))), (2nd ` s3)‚àà c2, (2nd ` s3)‚äÜ(Pairs ` c3))
  mpbird((s3 = < s0, s1 > ‚àß(s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)))), (2nd ` s3)‚äÜ(Pairs ` c3), s1 ‚äÜ(Pairs ` c3))
  adantl(s3 = < s0, s1 >, (s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1))), s1 ‚äÜ(Pairs ` c3))
  mpbid((s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1))), s1 ‚äÜ(Pairs ` c3), s1 ‚äÜ(Pairs ` s0))
  adantl(s0 = c3, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)), s1 ‚äÜ(Pairs ` s0))
  rexlimiva(s2, cuspgr, ((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1), s1 ‚äÜ(Pairs ` s0))
  mpbid((s2 ‚àà USPGraph ‚àß((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1)), s1 ‚äÜ(Pairs ` s0), (Edg ` s2)‚äÜ(Pairs `(Vtx ` s2)))

  sseq12d((Edg ` s2), (Pairs `(Vtx ` s2)), s1, (Pairs ` s0), ((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1))
  simpr((Vtx ` s2)= s0, (Edg ` s2)= s1)

  fveq2(s0, c3, cspr)
  adantr(s3 = < s0, s1 >, (s0 = c3 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà USPGraph,((Vtx ` s2)= s0 ‚àß(Edg ` s2)= s1))), ((2nd ` s3)‚äÜ(Pairs ` c3)‚Üî s1 ‚äÜ(Pairs ` c3)))
  sseq1d((2nd ` s3), (Pairs ` c3), s1, s3 = < s0, s1 >)
  op2ndd(s3, s0, s1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  bitri((2nd ` s3)‚àà c2, (2nd ` s3)‚äÜ(Pairs ` c3), (2nd ` s3)‚àà P((Pairs ` c3)))
  eleq2i((2nd ` s3), c2, P((Pairs ` c3)))
  elpw((2nd ` s3), (Pairs ` c3))
  fvex(c2nd, s3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (2nd ` s3), c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, s3)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, (2nd ` s3), c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2nd, s3)
  diff.c2nd.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.wss.s(s2, s1, (Pairs ` s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)

blocks.name: uspgrsprf1
blocks.content: The mapping ` F ` is a one-to-one function from the "simple pseudographs" with a fixed set of vertices ` V ` into the subsets of the set of pairs over the set ` V ` . (Contributed by AV, 25-Nov-2021.)

blocks.name: uspgrsprfo
blocks.content: The mapping ` F ` is a function from the "simple pseudographs" with a fixed set of vertices ` V ` onto the subsets of the set of pairs over the set ` V ` . (Contributed by AV, 25-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm uspgrsprfo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c4, cpw(cfv(cspr, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, copab(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s3, c3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c4), wf(c2, c3, c4), wral(hs0, c4, wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1))))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c3, c4))
  uspgrsprf(s0, s1, s2, s3, c2, c3, c4, c0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c4, wcel(c0, c1), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))))
  impcom(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))))), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cspr, c0)))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cspr, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cfv(cspr, c0))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), c4, cpw(cfv(cspr, c0)))

blocks.name: uspgrsprf1o
blocks.content: The mapping ` F ` is a bijection between the "simple pseudographs" with a fixed set of vertices ` V ` and the subsets of the set of pairs over the set ` V ` . See also the comments on ~ uspgrbisymrel . (Contributed by AV, 25-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm uspgrsprf1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c4, cpw(cfv(cspr, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, copab(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s3, c3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c3, c4), wf1(c2, c3, c4), wfo(c2, c3, c4))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wf1(c2, c3, c4))
  uspgrsprf1(s0, s1, s2, s3, c2, c3, c4, c0)
  uspgrsprfo(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  df-f1o(c2, c3, c4)
}

blocks.name: uspgrex
blocks.content: The class ` G ` of all "simple pseudographs" with a fixed set of vertices ` V ` is a set. (Contributed by AV, 26-Nov-2021.)

thm uspgrex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  -| wceq(c3, cpw(cfv(cspr, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, copab(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s2, cuspgr, wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cedg, cv(s2)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  mpbiri(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  eqeltri(c3, universe, cpw(cfv(cspr, c0)))
  pwex(cfv(cspr, c0))
  fvex(cspr, c0)

blocks.name: uspgrbisymrel
blocks.content: There is a bijection between the "simple pseudographs" for a fixed set ` V ` of vertices and the class ` R ` of the symmetric relations on the fixed set ` V ` . The simple pseudographs, which are graphs without hyper- or multiedges, but which may contain loops, are expressed as ordered pairs of the vertices and the edges (as proper or improper unordered pairs of vertices, not as indexed edges!) in this theorem. That class ` G ` of such simple pseudographs is a set (if ` V ` is a set, see ~ uspgrex ) of equivalence classes of graphs abstracting from the index sets of their edge functions. Solely for this abstraction, there is a bijection between the "simple pseudographs" as members of ` G ` and the symmetric relations ` R ` on the fixed set ` V ` of vertices. This theorem would not hold for ` G = { g e. USPGraph | ( Vtx `` g ) = V } ` and even not for ` G = { <. v , e >. | ( v = V /\ <. v , e >. e. USPGraph ) } ` , because these are much bigger classes. (Proposed by Gerard Lang, 16-Nov-2021.) (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2021.)

  -| wceq(c3, crab(s4, cpw(cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s5, c0, wral(s6, c0, wb(wbr(cv(s5), cv(s4), cv(s6)), wbr(cv(s6), cv(s4), cv(s5)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s6)
  -| diffss(s5, s6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s5, c0)
  -| diffsc(s5, c1)
  -| diffsc(s6, c0)
  -| diffsc(s6, c1)
} = {
  sylib(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wf1o(cv(s0), c2, c3)), wbr(c2, cen, c3))
